alert.note: Alert for Chase; Keith; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 1:58AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Perkins, eastern Keith and Chase Counties through 130 AM MDT... At 1258 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ogallala to 8 miles southeast of Venango to 11 miles southeast of Holyoke. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ogallala, Imperial, Grant, Paxton, Madrid, Elsie, Lamar, Sarben, Keystone, Champion, Roscoe, Kingsley Dam, Crete, Chase, Nevens, Broganville, Big Bald Hill, Wild Horse Spring and Wanamaker State Wildfire Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 41 and 97. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 122 and 149. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
